TopicTitle: Docking mode does not switch to translation

Articles.Content:
The translation movement mode is not selected when switching to docking mode. Manually enabling it does not work either.

However the normal keys for translation still function.

I have a few mods installed but none of them affect movement modes.
Is it an old settings.cfg? Some bindings changed with 1.0, try renaming it so KSP makes a new one.

Is it an old settings.cfg? Some bindings changed with 1.0, try renaming it so KSP makes a new one.

It isn't an issue of keybindings, the translation movement mode does not function. Instead, it is still possible to stage while the docking panel is open.

EDIT: ...and now I noticed you've already solved this problem for someone else directly below this thread, apologies for my lack of observation.

Edited June 11, 2015 by SergeantBlueforce
